entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH On 05/11, Trump said anyone who "wants" a test can get one.  However, his representative standing next to him seemed to indicate you can only get the test if you "need" it.  That you have to have symptoms related to the Coronavirus. That's a big difference.
